Description: Figure; bone; carved in low relief; nude male walking towards left, but top part of body is twisted slightly right; left arm is raised; in the right he carries a basket of flowers.
Bibliographic references: Petrie at al 1915 / Heliopolis, Kafr Ammar and Shurafa (p. 43, pl. L.1)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
Acquisition notes: Register says found c. 6 miles south of Helouan.
